name: Natural: Avoid Batch Programs not declaring the ON ERROR clause
description: This diagnostic will return the Artifacts that have no ON ERROR clause specified
rationale: Proactive handling of errors or exceptions significantly streamlines debugging. Without proper error handling, users may receive run-time errors, which are difficult to understand. The Natural Program has this Error routine and is used by all the Natural artifact subsequent in the call graph.

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
